resources.string: Keeping You Focused, Keeping You Safe.
Follow these simple steps to set up and use the EyeDTrack system for real-time driver attention monitoring.
EyeDTrack is a real-time driver attention monitoring system that detects inattention using motion detection.
How does EyeDTrack detect driver inattention?
It analyzes visual and behavioral data to identify distractions like phone use, drowsiness, or looking away from the road.
How does the alert system work?
It sends real-time visual and audio alerts when signs of distraction or drowsiness are detected.
Is EyeDTrack compatible with all vehicles?
Yes, it is designed to be cost-effective and adaptable for various vehicle types.
How accurate is EyeDTrack in detecting drowsiness or distraction?
The system is trained using machine learning to ensure high accuracy and minimal false alerts.
How does EyeDTrack improve road safety?
It detects inattention early, preventing accidents and promoting safer driving habits.

Terms and Conditions 
 
Effective Date: March 17, 2025

 1. Introduction
 Keeping You Focused, Keeping You Safe.
 Welcome to EyeDTrack (Company, we, our, us). By accessing our mobile application EyeDTrack and using our services, you agree to comply with these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

 7. Contact Information

End-User License Agreement (EULA)


Effective Date: April 25, 2025 
Last Updated: April 25, 2025


 This End-User License Agreement ("Agreement") is a legal agreement between you ("User", "you", or "your") and EyeDTrack ("we", "our", or "the Company") for the use of the EyeDTrack mobile application ("Application").


 By downloading, installing, or using the Application, you agree to be bound by the terms of this Agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, do not use the Application.


1. License Grant 
We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license to install and use the Application solely for personal, non-commercial purposes in accordance with this Agreement.


2. Restrictions 
You agree not to: 
 - Modify, reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble the Application. 
 - Reproduce, distribute, or resell the Application or any part thereof. 
 - Use the Application for any unlawful or unauthorized purposes. 
 - Bypass or breach any security or authentication measures.


3. Intellectual Property 
All intellectual property rights in and to the Application are owned by or licensed to EyeDTrack. This Agreement does not grant you any rights to our trademarks or other intellectual property.


4. Privacy and Data Usage 
By using the Application, you consent to the collection and use of your data as described in our Privacy Policy.


5. Disclaimers 
 - The Application is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranty of any kind. 
 - We do not guarantee that the Application will detect all forms of distraction or prevent accidents. 
 - The Application is not a replacement for responsible driving behavior.


6. Limitation of Liability 
EyeDTrack shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.


7. Termination 
This Agreement is effective until terminated. Your rights under this Agreement will terminate automatically if you breach any part of it.


8. Amendments 
We reserve the right to modify this Agreement at any time.


9. Governing Law 
This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Philippines.


10. Contact Information 
Email: eyedtrack@gmail.com 
Number: +639603687067

Data Processing Agreement (DPA)


Effective Date: April 26, 2025 
Last Updated: April 26, 2025


This Data Processing Agreement ("Agreement") outlines how EyeDTrack ("we", "our", or "the Company") collects, processes, stores, and protects personal data collected through the EyeDTrack mobile application ("Application").


1. Data Collection 
We collect limited personal and behavioral data necessary for the operation of the Application, including: 
 - Visual data from the camera for real-time driver attention monitoring. 
 - Usage statistics for improving system performance. 
 - Device information and connection status.


2. Purpose of Processing 
Data collected is used exclusively to: 
 - Monitor driver attention and detect distractions. 
 - Provide real-time alerts for safety purposes. 
 - Improve and optimize the Application.


3. Data Storage and Security 
All collected data is securely transmitted to our cloud servers. 
We implement technical and organizational measures to protect data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.


4. Data Retention 
Personal and behavioral data is retained only as long as necessary to fulfill the monitoring service or as required by law. 
Users may request deletion of their data at any time by contacting us.


5. User Rights 
You have the right to: 
 - Access the personal data we hold about you. 
 - Request correction or deletion of your data. 
 - Object to or restrict certain types of processing.


6. Third-Party Sharing 
We do not sell, rent, or share your personal data with third parties, except: 
 - When required by law. 
 - To cloud service providers solely for processing under our instructions.


7. International Transfers 
If data is transferred internationally, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information.


8. Changes to this Agreement 
We may update this Data Processing Agreement from time to time. Any changes will be posted in the Application.


9. Contact Information 
For any questions or requests related to this Agreement, please contact us at: 
 - Email: eyedtrack@gmail.com 
 - Phone: +63 960-368-7067
